meta.title: Hot Takes With Matt Gaetz
meta.description: Hot Takes with Matt Gaetz gives the listener a full access, behind-the-scenes look into the Swamp of Washington without the spin of Fake News. Matt Gaetz brings you the news of the day without holding back any punches. No spin, no lies, all hard-hitting truths. Subscribe today to never miss Hot Takes with Matt Gaetz. NEW EPISODES EVERY WEEKDAY!
meta.author: Matt Gaetz
meta.summary: Hot Takes with Matt Gaetz gives the listener a full access, behind-the-scenes look into the Swamp of Washington without the spin of Fake News. Matt Gaetz brings you the news of the day without holding back any punches. No spin, no lies, all hard-hitting truths. Subscribe today to never miss Hot Takes with Matt Gaetz. NEW EPISODES EVERY WEEKDAY!

episodes.title: Episode 7 - Rubio Tapped for Intel Chairman, Trump Leading on COVID Testing, Camp David's Incredible History
episodes.description: Rep. Gaetz gives his takes on Senator Marco Rubio taking over as Senate Intelligence Chairman, how the Trump Administration is leading on COVID-19 testing, and details the incredible history of Camp David from his weekend with President Trump.
episodes.summary: Rep. Gaetz gives his takes on Senator Marco Rubio taking over as Senate Intelligence Chairman, how the Trump Administration is leading on COVID-19 testing, and details the incredible history of Camp David from his weekend with President Trump.

episodes.title: Episode 6 - Camp David Revelations, NAS Pensacola Shooter's al Qaeda ties, and Chinese Drones
episodes.description: Congressman Gaetz discusses his weekend with President Trump at Camp David, the breaking news today the NAS Pensacola Shooter was Linked to al Qaeda, and his policy discussions with administration officials on WHO funding and DJI Chinese drones.
episodes.summary: Congressman Gaetz discusses his weekend with President Trump at Camp David, the breaking news today the NAS Pensacola Shooter was Linked to al Qaeda, and his policy discussions with administration officials on WHO funding and DJI Chinese drones.

episodes.title: Episode 5 - Proxy Voting, Media Bailouts, and Pelosi's Radical COVID Bill
episodes.description: Congressman Gaetz reveals how he'll vote on Nancy Pelosi's COVID bill today, talks proxy voting, media bailouts, and the optimism surrounding re-opening sports across the country.
episodes.summary: Congressman Gaetz reveals how he'll vote on Nancy Pelosi's COVID bill today, talks proxy voting, media bailouts, and the optimism surrounding re-opening sports across the country.

episodes.title: Episode 4: Joe Biden Exposed in Flynn Case, Governor DeSantis Fighting in Florida, Burr's Stock Selloffs
episodes.description: BIDEN EXPOSED: New documents show Biden on a list of Obama admin officials who attempted to unmask Michael Flynn. Congressman Gaetz breaks down the latest along with Governor DeSantis leading in Florida during COVID, Senator Burr's stock selloff, and more.
episodes.summary: BIDEN EXPOSED: New documents show Biden on a list of Obama admin officials who attempted to unmask Michael Flynn. Congressman Gaetz breaks down the latest along with Governor DeSantis leading in Florida during COVID, Senator Burr's stock selloff, and more.

episodes.title: Episode 3 - Pelosi's Wish List Bill, Flynn Saga, Burr’s and Loeffler’s Stock Trades
episodes.description: Congressman Gaetz breaks down the most egregious content in Nancy Pelosi's latest COVID bill, discusses the latest with Michael Flynn and gives hot takes on Richard Burr’s and Kelly Loeffler’s stock trade saga.
episodes.summary: Congressman Gaetz breaks down the most egregious content in Nancy Pelosi's latest COVID bill, discusses the latest with Michael Flynn and gives hot takes on Richard Burr’s and Kelly Loeffler’s stock trade saga.

episodes.title: Episode 2 - Jeff Sessions Reflections, COVID Senate Hearing, Richard Grenell Cleaning House
episodes.description: Congressman Gaetz breaks down today's Senate Health Committee hearing on COVID-19, discusses the excellent job Acting Director of National Intelligence Richard Grenell is doing in his new position, and reflects on why Former Attorney General Jeff Sessions was wholly ineffective in his role at the Department of Justice.
episodes.summary: Congressman Gaetz breaks down today's Senate Health Committee hearing on COVID-19, discusses the excellent job Acting Director of National Intelligence Richard Grenell is doing in his new position, and reflects on why Former Attorney General Jeff Sessions was wholly ineffective in his role at the Department of Justice.

episodes.title: Episode 1 - 60 Minutes, Trey Gowdy, POTUS Meeting
episodes.description: In this inaugural episode of "Hot Takes with Matt Gaetz," Congressman Gaetz hits back at a 60 Minutes hit piece that aired over the weekend, discusses his criticism of Trey Gowdy and Paul Ryan on live TV, and gives an update on his White House meeting with President Trump last Friday.
episodes.summary: In this inaugural episode of "Hot Takes with Matt Gaetz," Congressman Gaetz hits back at a 60 Minutes hit piece that aired over the weekend, discusses his criticism of Trey Gowdy and Paul Ryan on live TV, and gives an update on his White House meeting with President Trump last Friday.
